korean: 나사를 조이고 판을 끼우는 데 두 시간이 걸렸다.
완성하고 나니까 뿌듯하고 방이 더 정리된 느낌이다.
english: The bookshelf I ordered online arrived, so I assembled it.
I followed the manual, but it was more complicated than I thought.
It took two hours to tighten screws and fit the panels.
After finishing, I feel proud and the room feels more organized.
